alert.note: Alert for Pierce (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 11 at 8:27PM CDT until May 11 at 9:30PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: The National Weather Service in the Twin Cities has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Dakota County in east central Minnesota... Goodhue County in southeastern Minnesota... Pierce County in west central Wisconsin... * Until 930 PM CDT. * At 827 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Stanton, or near Northfield, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Cannon Falls around 840 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Welch, Red Wing, Bay City and Frontenac. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for south central, southeastern and east central Minnesota...and west central Wisconsin. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for south central, southeastern and east central Minnesota...and west central Wisconsin.
